cause.description:
I want people to look at this and not see just another cause, not just another reason. I want people to see a Revolution!!!
I have always wanted to help. And now I feel I have enough brain power and ideas to lift it off. But I would like your help. Support this Cause. Help in the fight. Start a Revolution.
Please Join. And Help me. Help Africa.
-Jackie
1. Poverty rates are higher then ever and must be stopped.
2. African's cannot even afford $.20 medicational vaccines for malaria.
3. AIDS and Hunger are killers that can be stopped with teaching and people.
cause.mission: Start the healing process in Africa!
cause.name: African Relief Revolution
